        public Client(java.lang.String ip,
              int port,
              ClientInputHandler localInput,
              ClientServerInputHandler remoteInput)
       throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
              java.io.IOException
        Client constructor to be launched by a terminal
        Parameters:
        ip - The remote IP to connect to
        port - The remote port to connect to
        localInput - The InputHandler to handle the local input
        remoteInput - The InputHandler to handle the remote output
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - If Socket connection cannot be established
        java.io.IOException - If Socket connection cannot be established
